column4: Supposedly ubuntu usually comes with built in orca (text to speech program).  Also when i check the software section it shows orca as being installed, but i can't for the life of me figure out how to launch it.
can anyone tell me how to launch orca(text reader) in ubuntu?
tried typing it from the terminal?
sorry, i've never needed that funcunality and haven't used orca myself so i wouldn't know what to recomend to you
